column1: Custom Solution Development
All you need to get your organization started with Sahana Eden:
• A cloud-hosted Sahana Eden instance including DNS for 1 year
AidIQ designs, develops and deploys your Sahana Eden solution, made
to measure for the needs of your organization or community - at any scale
from small prototypes to large multi-year projects:
AidIQ provide you with second and third level support for your Sahana Eden solution, including:
• Analysis and resolution of defects
Price: charged hourly, please contact us for an offer
AidIQ design, develop and facilitate technical trainings for your Sahana Eden
project team (including system administrators and developers).
